column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////My bestie and I came here for a brunch outing. This turned out to be the perfect place. They didn't have any mimosas or Bellinis but they had a Bloody Mary bar and amazing sangria. I tried the blackberry sangria (or maybe it was black raspberry)
column2: it was refreshing and not too sweet and was made with real fruit
column3: not syrup! We tried the vegetable eggs Benedict with patatas bravas
column5: and the bacon Mac n cheese. Everything was outstanding. I'd highly recommend this place!
